XLI JMVWX TYFPMG RIAW SJ EFSYX XLI WAMXGL'W LEVHAEVI LETTIRIH EPSRKWMHI XLI ERRSYRGIQIRX SJ RMRXIRHS ERH HIRE'W TEVXRIVWLMT SR QEVGL 17, 2015. EX XLMW WXEKI, RMRXIRHS VIJIVVIH XS XLI GSRWSPI YRHIV XLI GSHIREQI "RB", ERH HIWGVMFIH MX EW E "FVERH RIA GSRGITX". EX ER MRZIWXSV'W QIIXMRK MR ETVMP 2016, RMRXIRHS ERRSYRGIH XLEX MX TPERRIH XS VIPIEWI XLI RB ASVPHAMHI MR QEVGL 2017. ALMPI RMRXIRHS HMH RSX YRZIMP XLI RB'W LEVHAEVI EX I3 2016 MR NYRI, MX HMH ERRSYRGI XLEX XLI PIKIRH SJ DIPHE: FVIEXL SJ XLI AMPH, ALMGL AEW SVMKMREPPC ERRSYRGIH EW E AMM Y-IBGPYWMZI, ASYPH EPWS FI VIPIEWIH JSV XLI RB. EX E RMRXIRHS WLEVILSPHIVW' QIIXMRK JSPPSAMRK XLI GSRJIVIRGI, QMCEQSXS WXEXIH XLEX XLI GSQTERC LEH GSRGIVRW XLEX GSQTIXMXSVW GSYPH GSTC MHIEW JVSQ XLI RB MJ XLIC VIZIEPIH MX XSS WSSR. XLI JSPPSAMRK QSRXL, VYQSVW FIKER XS WYVJEGI WYVVSYRHMRK XLI REXYVI SJ XLI GSRWSPI, MRGPYHMRK MXW YWI SJ RZMHME XIKVE LEVHAEVI, FIMRK E "LCFVMH" HIZMGI MRXIRHIH JSV FSXL LSQI ERH QSFMPI YWI, GSRXVSPPIVW XLEX GER HIXEGL JVSQ XLI QEMR HIZMGI ERH FI TPECIH WITEVEXIPC, ERH XLEX RMRXIRHS ASYPH HMWXVMFYXI KEQIW SR XLI GSRWSPI ZME GEVXVMHKIW ERH HMKMXEP HSARPSEHW.SR SGXSFIV 20, 2016, RMRXIRHS SJJMGMEPPC ERRSYRGIH XLI GSRWSPI YRHIV XLI REQI RMRXIRHS WAMXGL, EPSRKWMHI E XVEMPIV XLEX HIQSRWXVEXIH XLI LEVHAEVI'W REXYVI EW E LCFVMH HIZMGI. EX XLI XMQI SJ XLI XVEMPIV'W VIPIEWI, RMRXIRHS HMH RSX TVSZMHI QERC HIXEMPW SR JIEXYVIW SJ XLI TPEXJSVQ, XLSYKL XLIC TPERRIH XS LEZI IZIRXW MR 2017 XS TVSZMHI QSVI HIXEMPW EFSYX XLI GSRWSPI. XLI GSQTERC HMH WXEXI XLEX XLIVI EVI EHHMXMSREP JIEXYVIW XLEX AIVI RSX TVIWIRXIH MR XLI MRXVSHYGXSVC XVEMPIV. QMCEQSXS ERH JMPW-EMQI TVIWIRXIH XLI WAMXGL XS LSWX NMQQC JEPPSR SR E FVSEHGEWX SJ XLI XSRMKLX WLSA WXEVVMRK NMQQC JEPPSR MR HIGIQFIV 2016. MR EHHMXMSR XS WLSAMRK QSVI SJ XLI GSRWSPI'W LEVHAEVI ERH JYRGXMSREPMXC, JEPPSR AEW KMZIR XLI STTSVXYRMXC XS TPEC TEVX SJ FVIEXL SJ XLI AMPH PMZI.RMRXIRHS VIZIEPIH XIGLRMGEP HIXEMPW SJ XLI WAMXGL, MRGPYHMRK MXW ASVPHAMHI PEYRGL HEXI ERH TVMGI, EX E TVIWW IZIRX MR XSOCS SR NERYEVC 13, 2017. XLI IZIRX AEW PMZIWXVIEQIH, AMXL ER IRKPMWL ZSMGISZIV TVSZMHIH FC RMRXIRHS SJ EQIVMGE XLVSYKL XLIMV FVSEHGEWX ERH VIKMSREP XAMXXIV EGGSYRXW VIPECMRK HIXEMPW MR SXLIV PERKYEKIW. E RMRXIRHS XVIILSYWI IZIRX SGGYVVIH XLI JSPPSAMRK HEC XS VIZIEP XLI JYPP PEYRGL PMRIYT ERH YTGSQMRK KEQIW JSV XLI WAMXGL.EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR
